description: This file contains a script that sets up and runs an AI-powered educational agent called StudyScout. It leverages multiple AI models for memory, classification, summarization, and integrates tools like DuckDuckGo and YouTube to facilitate personalized learning experiences. The script includes initialization of storage, agent configuration, and a command-line interface for interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent that manages interactions, memory, tools, and execution flow.

classes.name: AgentMemory
classes.description: Handles the memory component of the agent, including storage, classification, summarization, and management.

classes.name: MemoryClassifier
classes.description: Performs classification of memory content to organize and prioritize information.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite-based database for storing memory data.

classes.name: MemoryManager
classes.description: Manages memory operations, including storage, retrieval, and updates.

classes.name: MemorySummarizer
classes.description: Generates summaries of stored memory content.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: Represents an AI model used for various tasks such as language understanding.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent sessions in SQLite database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides web search capabilities via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: study_agent
methods.description: Main function to initialize and run the StudyScout agent, handling user input, session management, and agent configuration.
